name: monogamy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact or custom of having a sexual relationship or marriage with only one other person at a time: Her husband seemed to be incapable of monogamy and had affairs throughout their marriage. Compare
bigamy
polyamory
polygamySee also
serial monogamy
biology
  specialized the fact of having only one mate (= sexual partner) at a time: In primates, difference in size seems to be related to monogamy: species with same-sized males and females tend to be more monogamous.
More examplesFewer examplesThe traditional understanding of marriage has monogamy and fidelity at its core.Islam allows men to take up to four wives, but women can require monogamy in a marriage contract.If monogamy is so rare in nature, is it a realistic goal for people?Monogamy is rare in most animal groups, but is common among birds.
